p: As Table 1 indicates, we performed a correlative analysis between G. uralensis dry weight of the root and the enzyme activity in C and N metabolism as well as C and N metabolites; the result showed a strong innate connection between the G. uralensis dry weight of the root and each index. The largest influences are conferred by root Si content and leaf total nitrogen of G. uralensis. According to the correlation coefficient, the different metabolites showed apparent positive correlations with related enzyme activity.
